code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  fixedPoint ( vector < int >&  arr )  {   int  l  =  0 ;   int  r  =  arr . size ()  -  1 ;       while  ( l  <  r )  {   const  int  m  =  ( l  +  r )  /  2 ;   if  ( arr [ m ]  -  m  >=  0 )   r  =  m ;   else   l  =  m  +  1 ;   }   return  arr [ l ]  ==  l  ?  l  :  -1 ;   }  };
